component.name: deleteCalendarEntry
component.description: Deletes an entry on the user's calendar list.

component.name: getCalendarEntry
component.description: Returns an entry on the user's calendar list.

component.name: createCalendarEntry
component.description: Adds an entry to the user's calendar list.

component.name: listCalendarEntries
component.description: Returns entries on the user's calendar list.

component.name: patchCalendarEntry
component.description: Updates an entry on the user's calendar list. This method supports patch semantics.

component.name: updateCalendarEntry
component.description: Updates an entry on the user's calendar list.
